title: Ep 118 | Phil's Most Unusual and Creative Baptisms, Offensive Jesus, and Slaves to Sin
description:
Phil gets plenty of unusual baptism requests, but wheelchairs, tracheotomies, and fighting dogs are no match for him. Jase shares the story of baptizing a woman who suffered from a crippling fear of water. And Phil, Al, Jase, and Zach discuss urban flight, why Jesus was offensive to so many people, the difference between believing in God and believing God, the truth about freedom and slavery, and the line only God could deliver.

https://HelixSleep.com/UNASHAMED 

https://KCLumdBlades.com 

https://NetSuite.com/PHIL 

Pre-order Jesus Politics by Phil Robertson: http://jesuspoliticsbook.com
